div.p: This code system contains codes for documenting the attributes of accessibility
This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/ig/vhdir/CodeSystem/codesystem-accessibility defines the following codes:

tr.td: Provides services that meet the social,cultural, and linguistic needs of persons.
Provides access to persons with disabilities.
Provides access which complies with the Americans with Disabilities Act and/or amendments.
Provides access using public transportation modes.
Provides capability to communicate when intended recipient is not immediately available.
Provides services for visually impaired persons.
Provides services for cognitively impaired persons.
Provides services for mobility impaired persons.
